question: What is the subject of the best-known works of writers Theodor Mommsen and Edward Gibbon?
vanilla_rag_result: The best-known works of Theodor Mommsen and Edward Gibbon focus on the history of Rome. Mommsen is renowned for his detailed description of the Roman Republic, while Gibbon is famous for his monumental work, "The History of the Decline and Fall of the Roman Empire."
